double_crochet in each of next 9 dcs 5 double_crochet over chain space round 16 double_crochet in all stitches around 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times follow round 17 of either basic beanie pattern from round 9 onwards follow the instructions below slip_stitch finishing round optional v2 filet pattern rounds sltst as per basic pattern or if preferred work an additional repeat of round 10 and
